Direct message the job poster from Intelletec
Jamie Voronkov Bernard
Intelletec has partnered with a VC-backed Neuroscience AI firm revolutionizing drug discovery. This firm has a huge focus on data as they work to redefine patient care and drug discovery. We are looking for a Head of Data Science to help build out this team over time. Individual will be a a player/ coach who is excited about leveraging machine learning technology and has an entrepreneurial mindset. Responsibilities:Build out the Data Science organization and set up vision and roadmapUtilize cutting edge data mining and AI machine learning techniquesDefine team organization and interface with founders to support key data initiativesUtilize background with computer vision, supervised and unsupervised learning techniques, deep learningTrack record of working on challenging bio problems and manipulating biological data sets Requirements:5+ years of experience working in biotech /pharma in a startup capacity Solid background in AI / Machine learning MS or PHD in a quantitative field from top school3+ years of experience managing a high-performing teamStrong communication skills: both internally and with external stakeholdersWillingness to be a hands on team playerExperience with Python, AWS, SQL
